metadata.title: CVE-2018-19788 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in PolicyKit (aka polkit) 0.115 that allows a user with auid greater than INT_MAX to successfully execute any systemctl command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-polkit-1.0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.5
libpolkit-agent-1-0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.5
libpolkit-backend-1-0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.5
libpolkit-gobject-1-0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.5
policykit-1 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: policykit-1 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.5').
